channel.title: Posts on Big Data in Biomedicine
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Big Data in Biomedicine

item.title: The fight against COVID-19
item.description: The CoVex systems medicine platform allows identifying putative drug targets and drug repurposing candidates to treat COVID-19.

item.title: MOLIT Symposium 2019
item.description: The first MOLIT Symposium is actively promoting the dialogue of implementing personalized medicine into treatment routine. Therefore, a platform to interlink practicing physicians and IT experts is formed. This opens up possibilities to join forces between oncology and IT on problems in patient care to make solutions usable in everyday clinical practice.
